answers.answer: I live in Healesville and have been travelling the WORLD to find a good endo. You are kidding me about a good one in Australia, right? Sorry, just couldn't help myself.I see Simon Forehan in Cabrini Hospital and he is highly trained in thyroid. BUT doesn't like giving out T3 supplement.  (So if you think you might need it, don't go see him)Depending on what your thyroid issues are you you might have to see if you can just do the ring arounds and see if anyone has an appointment coming up. I was lucky and got to see Simon on a Monday following a ring around and that was on the Thursday before.I HIGHLY do NOT recommend Dr Gerstmann in Ringwood. He makes ALL his patients wait 2 hours (literally), nice enough to talk to, but really doesn't listen, he is doing research in a diabetic injection and I think it not really into thyroids.Of course, don't forget you need a referral from the GP!

title: Recommendations for Endo in Australia
